typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	outputfilename as string
}
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as string,
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string,
		SellStartDate as string,
		SellEndDate as string,
		ModifiedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> salesTable
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ParentProductCategoryID as string,
		Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> saLEASoRDERTABLE
salesTable, saLEASoRDERTABLE join(salesTable@ProductCategoryID == saLEASoRDERTABLE@ProductCategoryID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[($outputfilename)],
	mapColumn(
		ProductID,
		Name = salesTable@Name,
		ProductNumber,
		Color,
		StandardCost,
		ListPrice,
		Size,
		Weight,
		ProductModelID,
		SellStartDate,
		SellEndDate,
		ModifiedDate,
		ProductCategoryID = saLEASoRDERTABLE@ProductCategoryID,
		ParentProductCategoryID,
		SalesCategoryName = saLEASoRDERTABLE@Name
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
